About Me

Let me tell you a little about why I do what I do...

Design, as an essential factor in communication/expression, started fascinating me many years back. Ever since, I was interested in its power of delivering messages through addressing our unconsciousness. I studied Media Management, frequently participate in different online courses, and design artwork in my free time. I like traveling and love to get inspired by different cultures and people. I aim to include this inspiration in future projects.

I believe that there are many businesses and ideas out there that have a high potential of improving our daily life. I do what I do because it is a pleasure for me to help these businesses communicating their products and services in the best way. With the brand Metabloom, my goal is to improve my skills continually and deliver high-quality work in the long-run.
